definitions.definition: an artificial body placed in orbit around the earth or moon or another planet in order to collect information or for communication.
examples: space station, space capsule, spacecraft; Morecommunications satellite, weather satellite "the satellite orbited the earth"Morecommunications satellite, weather satellite the satellite orbited the earth

definitions.definition: transmitted by satellite; using or relating to satellite technology.
a celestial body orbiting the earth or another planet.
examples: moon, secondary planet the two small satellites of Mars

definitions.definition: something that is separated from or on the periphery of something else but is nevertheless dependent on or controlled by it.
examples: satellite offices in London and New York

definitions.definition: a small country or state politically or economically dependent on another.
examples: branch, colony, protectorate, puppet state, possession, holding; Morehistoricalfief, vassal; informaloffshoot "a former satellite of the Soviet Union"Morefief, vassal; offshoot a former satellite of the Soviet Union

definitions.definition: a portion of the DNA of a genome with repeating base sequences and of different density from the main sequence.
